resources.string: The TOEIC test consists of 7 parts, divided into 2 sections: Listening and reading test. We will help you practice the listening test in this application. You will be asked to demonstrate how well you understand spoken English. The entire listening last will last approximately 45 minutes. There are four parts, and directions are given for each part. You must chose your answers by touching a suitable choice.

Directions: For each question in this part, you will hear four statements about a picture you\'ll see on your device. When you hear the statements, you must select the one statement best describes what you see in the picture.

Directions: You will hear a question or statement and three responses spoken in English. They will be spoken only one time and will not be printed on your screen. Select the best response to tne question or statement and mark the letter (A), (B), or (C).

Directions: You will hear some short talks given by a single speaker. You will be asked to answer three questions about what the speaker says in each short talk. Select the best response to each question and mark the letter (A), (B), (C). or (D).

string-array.item: Unit 6 - Bare infinitive, Gerund or infinitive

string-array.name: grammar_meaning
string-array.item: Động từ dạng V-ing (Hiện tại phân từ và danh động từ)
Nguyên thể khuyết; V-ing hay To V
Các thành phần chính của câu
Sự hòa hợp giữa chủ ngữ và động từ
Quan hệ giữa các ý trong câu: Quan hệ bổ sung - Quan hệ thời gian
Quan hệ giữa các ý trong câu: Quan hệ nguyên nhân - hệ quả
Quan hệ giữa các ý trong câu:Quan hệ nhượng bộ - Quan hệ mục đích
